text: Ta [an la] you wei jian zhi wu de yaoshi [zhu], chu ta wai, wu ren zhidao. Fan ludi he haiyang li de yiqie, ta quanzhidao. Napa shi luoxia de yipian yezi, ye meiyou ta bu zhidao de; wulun dixia chongchong hei'anzhong de yi li guzi, haishi yiqie xinxian de huo ganku de, dou yi jilu zai yi bu mingbai de jingdian zhong.
